Summary Heading: Clean, New, Fun… Can’t Wait To Go Back!
Summary: My wife and I made The Viv a two-night stay and our home base for a Christmas Day Disneyland trip to meet all of our adult children for the day. Check in was easy and we had been upgraded to the King Corner Suite which is virtually a 1 bedroom suite without a door between the large living area and bedroom area. The room had a perfect view of Disney Resort to the west and Mount Baldy to the north from the bedroom; and a decent view of the Orange Hills/Anaheim Hills to the east. The only way this room could've been better is if it had been a higher floor than 8th (which 8th floor was still amazing) and if the room had been designed using a bedroom and living room door at the ends of the bathroom hall (kind of like the standard Embassy Suites configuration). The hotel was super

A coin laundry and ice machine were great to have to access to. The room was clean, bright, spacious, high-ceilinged, and had bunk beds for the kids, which they loved. We caught the bus every day to Disneyland with no issues and spent barely any time in the hotel anyway. The last day we tried out the pool and the pool bar was closed, but the ground floor restaurant staff were really accommodating and brought our meals and drinks to the poolside regardless. Summary Heading: Modern hotel with unique room types for families

The hotel is conveniently located close to highway 5 and to Disneyland (shuttle available at $6/day/person). Nice facilities (two pools with one adult only rooftop pool, decent size fitness room). Inconsistent service: even with a five night stay we couldn’t figure out why room amenities weren’t being replenished (we asked extra at the front desk), why the bunk bed wasn’t being made up (called to have it done) and why the $6 cappuccino isn’t part of the elite breakfast (some days it is, some days it isn’t - likely just dependent on the server but formally it is not included as part of the ‘Marriott Elite breakfast’ which is a limited selection from

Summary Heading: Solid choice for Disneyland visit if you don't mind not being able to walk to the park
Summary: We stayed here for Veterans Day weekend.  We usually stay closer to Disneyland so we can walk to the park, but this was the only hotel option available as part of the Disneyland travel package by the time we booked.  Turned out to be a great place to stay.  What you give up in proximity (and it is still pretty close) you get in amenities (like pool, on-site restaurant and bar, everything seemed new and clean).  Getting Lyfts to and from the park every day was quick and easy (generally less than $10 each way without tip).  Every staff member we encountered was pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear wwwendyyy,  Thank you for being our guest at The Viv Hotel, Anaheim, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, and sharing your experience. Thank you again for your feedback, and we look forward to your return visit.   Yours in Hospitality, Kevin Beaver  Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Great stay but it is not close to Disneyland
Summary: Check in was a breeze.  Staff was a delight. We got upgraded -I think only as they were out of the room we requested. The room was fine but had bunk beds i it as well. Would have been  great for a family.   Clean and comfortable room so no problems there. Bathroom was a good size.   They have a shuttle seevuce run by a third party.  There’s kind of a schedule but no one  could commit to schedule so we blew  that off and drove  the 1.5 miles to the park and paid for parking. Overall a gray stay.

Summary: This hotel is located within a 5 minute ride to Disneyland. This Hotel is beautiful and very clean.  This hotel has a beautiful adults only pool on the roof top. There is also a pool on the main level with access to a pool bar if needed. There is a restaurant on site and an additional rooftop restaurant. There is also a gift shop on premises and a coffeeshop.

We had a standard Queen room and we found that it was cleaned every day which was something I was not expecting. Over all we had a fantastic stay the location for Disneyland is ideal. This will be our go to hotel when we return.

Hotel is very clean and the ambiance is certainly top notch. The roof top restaurants and bar provide a epic view of Anaheim. I would advise anyone staying ta the hotel to go up during sunset. Highly recommend the hotel especially if you travelling with family.

We took ubers to the parks as just a little far to walk, but these were cheap and easy.    A good choice for disney and families.

But everything else was great, not to mention the friendly service of Nikko and Ashley at the front desk. Very, very helpful and welcoming. His very accommodating, friendly and excellent customer service . He went up and beyond . I recommend the hotel and look for Nikko Fernandez . He deserve a recognition and a raise in his salary.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great stay. I am delighted to hear  that Nikko provided excellent customer service and was able to help you throughout your stay. Can't wait to host you again!

Summary: From the freeway driving north to Anaheim I saw this marvelous hotel with trees or something at the top floor and said, what’s the name of that hotel, we need to stay there…come to find out it was the Radisson Blu where I booked!!  I scored!!  From check in with Nikko, to Ryan assisting with luggage, to running into Alberto the janitor/maintenance at the 12th floor checking out the trees I spotted from the freeway, it was a scenic oasis with an adults only pool and jacuzzi - amazing!!  All staff were pleasant and delivered exceptional service!! Our room was exactly as the rooms looked in the picture, updated, spotless and super comfortable! This hotel is a 3 diamond??  Are you sure?  More like 5 diamond!  My family booked our stay for a couple days at Disneyland, everyone voted
Manager Response: Radisson Blu sure is a sight to see from the freeway, I think I have that same reaction every time I pass by. The top floor is amazing with great views! I am so happy that you got to meet some of our wonderful team members. To clarify we are a Brand New 4 Diamond resort. We can't wait for you to book your next reservation with us.

Summary: Multiple stains found in room on bed, pillows, and doors. Found bugs in the hotel room as well. Parking is not free as they charge $30 per night. No room service available. None of this should be an issue with a hotel that charges this much and boasts about its cleanliness and guests who have a great time there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Please contact me directly regarding your stay. I apologize that you found stains and will address that immediately with housekeeping. I would like to speak to you regarding your claim of bugs we do not have any reports regarding this. Parking is $25 and is the average fee in the theme park area. We do offer onsite, gated parking. I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: We are very satisfied on our stay. They’re facility is squeaky clean. Interior is modern. Pool is Mickey Mouse shape and has 3 different kind (heated pool, splash pad, sauna). The room is amazing. You can actually view the fireworks from Disney. Super love the storm trooper display as well as Lego mini figurines. Their food is amazing as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great day at our property! You noticed that the main pool is Mickey shaped with the splash pad being an ear! Very observant! The Disneyland fireworks sure are a treat from the view rooms! Hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful place to stay if you going to Disney Land in California
Summary: We stayed with our teenage kids at this Hotel for 2nights to go to Disney Land. It was 5 minutes drive to Disney. We really enjoyed our stay at this luxurious property. Lizzie and Jose at the concierge are so friendly and professional, pleasant and kind.  Dante & Danny at the restaurant were excellent with a great approach and services. They were so kind and open to helping us to find the best restaurants and places to be seen in Beverly Hills. We had a great time there, and definitely, we will stay there for the next time trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our wonderful staff! We definitely are centrally located in Southern California to many great places to see and visit. I am glad you found the proximity of our Good Neighbor Hotel convenient to Disneyland, some of our guests even walk! We are thrilled that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and can't wait to welcome you back to the Blu!

Summary: Stayed for two nights and loved everything about this hotel. The room was so roomy for our family of six plus two more adults. The pool was fantastic and the whole ambiance of the hotel was crisp, hip, and very classy. We’ll definitely be back again! Staff was great and super accommodation! 5 star experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! The rooftop pool has spectacular views and kids sure do love the splash area. Our rooms are very spacious, especially the bunk rooms. Come back and visit us soon,

Summary Heading: First Trip with boyfriend out to California
Summary: The hotel no doubt is very nice BUT they get you on the parking. While other hotels parking is free, this hotel does not include it. They charge you $25 a day.  For as much as you pay, breakfast is not included either. You have to make reservations at their restaurants and of course pay. Small snacks and fruits are also not included.  I also noticed that garbage bags were also never included when the room was cleaned. I asked management about this and they informed me that they would let housekeeping know and just gave me 2 bags for the night. Still, after complaining about it, the garbage bags weren't included. Also, the towel rack was falling apart. The only thing nice was that there was an adult pool upstairs, no children allowed. Families had access to the pool downstairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Sorry for the miscommunication.  We are environmentally friendly and do not use trash bags, Housekeeping does clean the waste baskets. Our secured parking is $25 per night which is standard among most of the Hotels in the area. I am so glad you got to experience the adult pool on the top floor, the views are amazing! Thank you for staying with us and hope that you will give us another chance in the future,

Summary: We just did a 6 night stay while doing Disney, the hotel is pristine and the rooms are huge. We really enjoyed the bunk bed option for our kids. Staff were super friendly and helpful at all times. Breakfast is a little pricey and restaurants/shops have limited hours would be my only complaint.
Manager Response: The bunk beds seem to be a huge hit with the kids! Thank you for the great comment about our staff, we enjoy the engagement with our guests. We are working on the hours of the food outlets and should be full service soon. Thank you for choosing to stay at Radisson Blu!

Summary: The hotel was in a great location and was kept very clean.  It was close to Disneyland and right by the highway.  There were also many restaurants nearby for us to choose from to eat.  It would have been nice if the hotel had microwaves in the guest room but other than that, I enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you  for the review! We do have a limited amount of microwaves available upon request. Our location is very convenient to many great restaurants and amenities.  I am thrilled you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Fantastic place to stay and decompress after a long day at the Disney parks. I have never experienced such great staff and the property itself is gorgeous and clean and tranquil.Can’t wait to stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We can not wait to see you again!

Summary: Amazing property. Convenient access to Disney, the rooms were clean and spacious, and the staff was so accommodating, helpful and kind. I would highly recommend staying here. It was a great experience.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you had a great experience at our hotel! Thank you for the review!

Summary: The hotel overall was really nice and fairly close to Disneyland. We went on a family trip to Disneyland and we thought it was pretty pleasant hotel. Only complain was the cleanliness in the room after housekeeping came we were not pleased at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Glad to hear that overall your experience was great!

Summary: If staying in or close to Anaheim this is the to go place for sure. Great location with amazing staff and plenty to do on property as well as walking or short driving distance. Great for all ages and self parking You will not regret it!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary Heading: You will be very pleased with stay !!!
Summary: The staff at this hotel are hands down doing a outstanding job!!!!  We were very impressed from the check in to the check out rooms are very clean. Coffee was fabulous and reasonable Uber to Disneyland.  I even left my iPods in the hotel room called hotel and they found  them and I was able to quickly return and pick them up.   Everyone at this lotion works as a team thank you for a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I am pleased to hear that you had a great stay. Glad we were able to get your Ipods back to you. We look forward to your next visit

Summary: We stayed in the Radisson Blu for two nights. The hotel was beautiful from top to bottom. The lobby areas were bright and the cafe had everything we needed and more. The staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms were stunning! The beds were huge and as we got over our jet lag it was the perfect place to relax! We spent time at the pool which was beautiful and there was lots of space to relax.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. Please visit us again soon.

Summary: This was my favorite hotel whenever coming to Anaheim for weekend basketball tournaments or to visit Disneyland. Everything was prefect with this place till our last visit a 3 weeks ago. I was told someone was going to call and reach out but never got a call back. We stayed here with family and even referred another family to book the same time as us. We checked in late around 830 into a double with the bunk beds and were shocked when we pulled the sheets and found a blood stain. We were not comfortable staying there knowing 1 of the sheets were not changed or cleaned. There was another brownish stain on the other set. Manager for the afternoon came and took pics. Apologized and transferred us to another room so we did not settle in for another hour. Dirty and blood stained
Manager Response: On behalf of the whole staff we apologize for the experience you had at our hotel. We take the cleanliness of the hotel very seriously and please know that this has been addressed with the team. If you would like to discuss your stay further I would love to hear from you. Please contact me directly at the hotel.

Summary Heading: Great experience. Very user friendly and efficient.
Summary: Booking car and hotel is the best way to enjoy a trip to LA, Anaheim through LAX. The Raddison Blue hotel in Anaheim is  located out of the crowds but very conveniently located in relation  to the park and other Anaheim activities.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, hope to have you visit again soon.

Summary: Very clean and nice place to stay. Had all the modern technology touches you needed. Elevator only allowed guests to go up with key card so very safe place to stay. Had nice selection of restaurants and shops downstairs for a quick bite or sit down meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Not my first visit but definitely not my last! Me and my wife visited the bar and had a great time there! We went to their beautiful rooftop pool and jacuzzi and relaxed there and enjoyed the view! Went to the gym it was a bit small but definitely had all the essentials.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. The rooftop pool has some amazing views of the city. Glad you had a great time.

Summary: Comfortable and large room to stay in with the family of 5 for our Disneyland trip. The beds were a little hard but if you like firm then you're good. The 1st floor pool was great & spacious. Kids loved it. Didn't need to worry about towels since they were provided @ the pool. Great experience!
Manager Response: Happy to hear that the kids loved the pool! Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Excellent hotel, modern, clean, friendly staff and very helpful. Spacious rooms and the bunkbeds were great for the kids. Quick shuttle distance to Disneyland. Beautiful view from the roof top. Nice pool, splash pad and jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great with the exception of the top of the building restaurant
Summary: The stay with my 13 year old was fantastic. Rooms were great. Staff was amazing, but the food at the Blusky restaurant was atrocious. I cannot believe it was as expensive as it was. My daughter and I ended up ordering doordash afterward because the food was that bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize that the food was unsatisfactory, we will use the feedback to fine tune our operation.

Summary: Couldn’t have asked for a better hotel I hit the jackpot with this one everything was great from check in to check out and staff were great as well my room was exceptional cleanliness parking is great too!
Manager Response: Thanks for a great review and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel is clean and comfortable. Great location in the ART route. On-site cafe was convenient, albeit a little expensive which is expected. Did not get to use the pool or hot tubs, but maybe next time. On-site restaurants were very expensive and we did not end up eating at either. Staff was super helpful and great.
Manager Response: Thank you for a wonderful review, please come back and try out the pools. The roof top 21+ pool has the most amazing views!

Summary: Loved my experience with the hotel from check until check out. The staff was friendly. The rooms were clean. They have a restaurant on site, however, we did not try it.  The kids loved having a bunk bed. Hotel was a short, easy drive to Disneyland. I loved that they had hardwood floors in the rooms as opposed to carpet. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: The kids sure love the bunks! Hope to see you again soon,

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a week for our family Disney trip. Super clean and our kids loved the outdoor pool! Walking distance to the Disney Resort is 15min - 20min, totally manageable. Lavazza coffee is an excellent touch. We prefer the Lavazza over Starbucks
Manager Response: I am happy to hear that you loved the Coffee and the your son loved the pool. Thank you for the review!

Summary: We stayed at the Raddison Blu on a Disneyland trip for four nights. The hotel is absolutely beautiful! I am light sleeper and slept like a baby. The beds are on the firmer side, but very comfortable. The rooms have blackout curtains as well. The shower has tall shower heads, so thank you Raddison for thinking of us tall people. We swam in the rooftop pool ( adult only) 3 times, which was nice. My only complaint is it closes at 10pm. It would have been nice to soak in the hot tub after Disney.  They also have a downstairs pool for all ages. We didn’t swim there, but the area looked nice. All of the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed the pool! Isn't the view amazing? I will pass on your suggestion regarding keeping the pool open later to enjoy. Thank you for choosing us!

Summary: My family of 3 stayed here using two Travelzoo vouchers. Upon arrival we were greeted with disdain from two rude staff who were not hospitable at all. Before our staycation began, I made calls to the hotel several times asking questions about ammenities as my son is 5 and I wanted to make sure that we had options. No dinner options for my son at all in the hotel for the nights we were there. The night we decided to dine in their rooftop restaurant (Which is not kid friendly) they informed us that a private party booked the entire rooftop so we would have to dine indoor. My husband and I were just tired, hungry and disappointed so we dined. Food was delicious and our waiters there were great. But we were sitting in the center of the restaurant so can barely experience the Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback and apologize for the service you received. I am glad you enjoyed your dinner and hope you give us another chance to make it right,

Summary: Did not expect too much since it was a mid-price hotel in the middle of Orange County, near Disneyland. The entire hotel is beautiful and clean. Staff were very friendly and rooms were somewhat sound-proof (better than most hotels with thin walls). Parking garage is very convenient too. Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you!!

Summary Heading: If you go, go for the restaurants only
Summary: The hotel rooms are on the cheap side; beds, linens, bathroom products so this isn't the place for fancy. The BluSky restaurant however, that place was worth a visit. The restaurant deserves to be at a much nicer hotel. There's a severe disconnect between how great the restaurant is and how not great the hotel rooms are. Hotel rooms are not worth their exorbitant price.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your review!

Summary: Stayed for 3 knife for our wedding anniversary with friends ours was our 10 year wedding anniversary our friends with her 21st year wedding anniversary. Communication was bad no follow-through when problems were president and a bunch of staff with attitude and not able to do much for you manager never responded unless they told me he was on vacation for the weekend
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and Happy 10 year Anniversary! I apologize for the service you received. Please contact the hotel directly if you would like to discuss the issues further.

Summary: They claim they can only clean the room every 3rd night as a result of Covid-19. Frankly, I see it as a way to hire less staff and being cheap. I have been to a half dozen hotels in the last year and none were nearly this bad on claiming they can't clean the room. One of the perks of a hotel is letting someone else do the cleaning; if you like that as well, stay clear of this hotel.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you were disappointed with our housekeeping services. We currently are  doing full  housekeeping every third day but are happy to  supply you with any amenities that you may need during your stay. Thank you for the review and hope that you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: We were so disappointed with this hotel & wish we knew it wasn’t back up & running when we booked it. The restaurant and coffee shop closed arbitrarily twice during our stay. Service non existent as well. We booked hoping it would be nicer hotel in Disneyland area. Rooms were clean and modern but not having things available & open on property wasn’t expected. Having to UBER for afternoon coffee & dinner is frustrating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are updating the our outlet hours on a consistent basis. We hope that you will give us another try.

Summary: Close to Disney with shuttle. Enjoyed the free parking, and the beds were very comfortable. And being a new hotel very clean. If the Restraunt experience improves I rate higher than 4. The staff was superb
Manager Response: Thank you for your review

Summary: Unhappy with this stay, no towels and item missing from room. Food was horrible, burn no taste. Shower stall leaks water under shower stall door and on to floor. Definitely not coming back to this hotel.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff at Radisson Blu Anaheim - ANAC we apologize for the concerns you shared about your experience at this hotel.  I have addressed the issues with our management team , and I assure you we are working diligently to ensure a similar situation does not occur again in the future.  We appreciate the feedback and will use it to fine tune our operations in the hope that upon your next visit we can exceed your expectations.

Summary: Easy walking distance to Disneyland. Our room had a great view of the fireworks. The layout of the room included 2 double beds and a bunk bed which was perfect for our family. We didn't have time to enjoy the fitness center or pools but they looked amazing. Would definitely stay here again if visitiing Disney.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear about your great experience at our hotel.  Glad you had the opportunity to see the fireworks from your room.  Thank you for your business we hope to see you again.

Summary: The hotel is a trek from Anaheim and it is in a noisy location off the freeway. All of that could be overlooked were it not for the extremely poor customer service. I was evicted by security for quietly reading a book in the lounge chairs across from the adult rooftop pool. When I asked the manager why I could not read my book there she had no valid reason. Don’t mean to pull a Karen but this was very disappointing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: We had a great time cleanliness the size of the room was great fit my family of 5 did not feel cramped at all . The staff was helpful and courteous the view was great all in all I would recommend this hotel
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear we exceeded your expectations. Thank you for choosing to stay with us we hope to see you again.

Summary: Amazing! I recommend it 100%, first trip to Disney! Radisson made it extra especially, the service and cleanliness was awesome! It’s walking distance from park, but after a long day the bus might not be a bad idea. I also got free parking for my five day stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: It was a great place to stay, the room was clean and the perfect setup for a family.  Our kids loved the pool. Over all just a great stay.  The hotel was close to the many attractions of Disneyland and not far from some great beaches
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: Super friendly staff. Wonderful accommodations!  Very clean. Breakfast was awesome. Close to Disneyland but not walking distance.  We went for a basketball tournament and the gym was across the street. Perfect location. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: Very clean hotel and all staff was friendly and nice. Great stay for 4 days! The pool was a hit for our kids because they were heated. Just a very clean and happy environment for our family. I would come back to this hotel because of the great service and environment!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: Loved the room. It had a lot of great amenities. Breakfast was not included for free, you do have to pay for parking as well. But staff was great rooms were amazing and spacious. A lot was included in the rooms. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: This hotel was amazing close to freeway clean and very close amenities i would recommend this hotel to all , the facility was very clean the staff was very helpful and professional great place for kids and adults
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: Great hotel with beautiful design, modern spacious rooms, great service and dito breakfast menu to choice from. The top floor bar provides a magnificent view. Can recommend to anyone. Would like to come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: Amazing staff, room, facilities, view!!! I recently lost my home and everything in the CALDOR FIRE, I really needed to get away and smile again, so my family and I decided to go to Disneyland, we had an amazing time, when at hotel we swam and ate and slept like babies!! Thank you Blu for giving us a much needed family trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary Heading: Gorgeous groovy hotel with stellar service and views
Summary: This was completely unexpected and a delightful surprise. Just about all the rooms have incredible views and many are overlooking both theme parks as well as the fireworks from Disneyland. The rooftop Jacuzzi pool bar and restaurant are a must see and the food and cocktails were wonderful so be sure to make your dinner reservations when you book your hotel room. The staff and service was excellent and really worked to make our stay special, we will definitely be coming back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you gor the wonderful review. ope to see you again soon !

Summary: We stay here every time we are in Anaheim because of the hotel staff and cleanliness of the entire property.  Jose at the front desk has checked us in the last few times  we have stayed there and is always so accommodating and kind. He is always smiling and seems genuinely happy to be helping you. We absolutely recommend staying here if you want excellent service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are glad that you enjoy our property.  Jose will love the nice comments, I will be sure to pass them along. See you again soon!

Summary: Great clean hotel.  Everything we needed was there.  Staff was friendly and all the amenities were available when needed.  Shuttles to Disney were convenient and parking was super easy and always available.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We would love to see you come back and visit!

Summary: We felt like the lobby and common areas were like we were in an art museum. The rooms was well thought out. Lots of drawers (which you don't see in many of the newer hotels), storage, good lighting, double sinks. Beautiful roof top views!
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our modern rooms, they sure do have plenty of luggage and storage space. Thank you for your review. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Loved that the rooms do not have carpet. Staff was very nice and friendly. We will stay here again. Although we did not use the pool it looked beautiful and the rooftop restaurant looked fantastic too.  Also, we watched the Disneyland fireworks from out room and it was fabulous!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Called and asked when I could check in,she told me 3 pm, when I got there at 3:05 the two girls told me oh we never said that, check in is always at 4. Waited 1 1/2 hours, was there for a wedding where all 3 of my daughters were in a wedding party which was 30 mins away at 5. Got my keys couldn’t make it up to the room, had to leave. There were about 5 more couples that were waiting for rooms to get ready for the same wedding, there were a big block of rooms that were set aside for the wedding. We were told that they’re still cleaning the rooms. Check in 5 pm and check out by 10 am- how many hours is that- 17 hours- not even 24 hours. Everyone in lobby was livid, one woman helping everyone, one guy comes out later and acts like he’s doing something on the computer, a woman that
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff at Radisson Blu Anaheim we apologize for the concerns you shared about your experience at this hotel.  I have addressed the issues  with our team, and I assure you we are working diligently to ensure a similar situation does not occur again in the future.  We appreciate the feedback and will use it to fine tune our operations in the hope that upon your next visit we can exceed your expectations.

Summary: Room was very clean and modern. The pool downstairs was always supplied with towels . The pool upstairs has great views . The restaurant downstairs was delicious. Overall a great experience. Definitely would return
Manager Response: I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Good location for Anaheim and surrounding area attractions. Easy check in, check out, good self parking access, loved the kid pool. BUT the beds suck. Hardest mattress ever, actually caused me physical discomfort. The pillows are like 10 inches long and a joke for support.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I have addressed your concerns about the beds with housekeeping. I am happy to hear the check in/out process was easy.

Summary Heading: Great family stay for several day Disney trip!
Summary: The room was large and spacious. Great view of the Disneyland Parks! The kids enjoyed the bunk beds with overhead night lights to read before bed. Room and hotel was clean. Appreciated the security to access the floors with assigned key cards. Overall a great stay, would stay again with family or even a getaway stay with my spouse.
Manager Response: Aren't the bunk beds fun? Glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Great for Families With Small Children
Summary: We stayed at Radisson Blu for 3 nights while we visited the 2 Disney parks and had such a great experience. Check in was easy and you can use your room key to get in and out of the parking garage ($25 per night). We had a King room with the bunk bed for our two boys (6&7) and also had a baby crib for our 1 year old. Everything fit comfortably and we still had room to move around which was a big deal for our large family. The pool was heated and a great size for young kids. There is a shuttle that stops right at the front of the hotel and takes you to Disney so that is convenient. However, if you have a larger stroller or a double like we did, it is not easy to collapse it and get it on the shuttle and there really isn't anywhere to put it. And collapsing it to ride the shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review. We enjoyed having you!

Summary: Hotel property is very clean and modern looking, well maintained exterior and lobby area. Rooms were clean. Only minor drawback which didn't even really bother us was that there were stains on the bed sheets. The sheets were clean but the stains were obviously permanent. Paid for fireworks view, but only had a "park view". Room was on the 9th floor, but didn't realize that the fireworks are shot very very low, so you can't see it as Matterhorn Mountain blocks the view. We clearly knew the fireworks were going off as we could see the spotlights in action and the random color changes happening against the buildings close to the park. Not complaining about it, but just an FYI for future guests of the hotel. Bathroom was very clean. Only negative I could give is that the hot water
Manager Response: Thank you for such a detailed review.  We will use it to fine tune our operation, Come visit us again soon.

Summary: This is a newer property and I felt it was clean. Our issues really were more service related. The first problem that I had (and I understand the hotel cannot vet rude/unruly guests) was a group having a full on party in the hallway at 2 AM. The highlight of this was when I opened my room door and found someones vomit soaked bathrobe in front of my door. Chunks of the vomit were in the hallway etc. I mean, REALLY? Who goes to Disney and has to get that wasted that they are A. Partying in the hallway being rude to other guests at 2 AM and B. Leaves a vomit soaked bathrobe in the hallway. Pretty gross. While the hotel cannot control guests, what they can do is have security cameras to monitor this behavior and (we were on the 11th floor) there were none at the end of the hallway
Manager Response: On behalf of the whole Radisson Staff I apologize for your experience. We are a family friendly hotel and do not tolerate unruly guests. Please contact me if you would like to discuss this further. We hope you give us another chance.

Summary Heading: Extra fees when you get to hotel
Summary: There where extra fees when you get there plus fees to park. I would not pick this location again not the best area or service. Hotel is clean pool and restaurant are decent. I would pick a different hotel next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Parking is $25 per night but you should not have any hidden fees, if you do, please contact me directly at the hotel. We hope you give us another chance.

Summary: We had a great experience.   My children loved the bunk bed.   Very nice and clean room.   Also very comfortable beds.   Good size bathroom.   It Takes 5 minutes drive to Disneyland.   We definitely will be back.
Manager Response: We can't wait to have you again!!

Summary: Scott from the front desk was amazing! He was friendly and told me all about the hotel amenities which I utilized. The cafe was also awesome coffee was perfect as with my breakfast sandwich I enjoyed. Overall AWESOME and PLEASANT EXPERIENCE. Can't wait to come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, Scott will be pleased to know that he help create your wonderful experience!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, convenient location, poor service and just ok food
Summary: Nice hotel, convenient location to Disney parks, expensive and just ok food, and the front desk staff are semi-pleasant. They suffer from front desk practices, though. From my experience, they will not accept certain corporate Visa cards and they will attempt to put you in a cheaper room than what you booked. I recommend calling them prior to arrival to make sure they will take your corporate credit card and then once checking in confirm you are getting the room type you booked.
Manager Response: I apologize for your concerns about the Front Desk. We do accept Business Credit Cards as long as it is a major credit card and has the name of the guest imprinted on it. Please contact me if you would like to discuss your stay further. Thank you for your review!

Summary: If you're looking for a nice hotel close to disney, this is it. Great for families because of the large large large sizes of the rooms. Still have food options and a pool, great for when you wanna wind down after the parks. We stayed as part of a bridal party and the only annoying thing was having to need a key for the elevator to go to other people's rooms to deliver things and get ready and do other wedding logistics. I just want to get into an elevator and go.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: Visited friends in OC over weekend and was recommended to stay here by my friend. So happy we took her advice - awesome stay!  We travel all over the world, and a ton in Japan specifically where they're know for hospitality and clean (also affordable), so our standards are pretty high but diverse. This hotel exceeded expectations: new, clean, well designed, huge King room with space to host 4 loud girlfriends after a delicious dinner at the BluSky restaurant on the rooftop. Bed was comfy (perfect mix of firm and soft), plenty of plush towels, decent toiletries and body wash, easy spacious parking garage that's attached to the hotel for ease with baggage. There's also a small market for coffee and grab and go, 2 pools, and smaller cafe restaurant. We also received 2 vouchers for
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: While their usual check in is 4:00 PM and check out is 11:00 AM, which allows for plenty of time to prepare the room for upcoming guests. I made a request multiple time even during check in to extend my check out by one hour max but staff rudely declined my request. Having stayed in multiple hotels during my trip to US, I found this quite weird
Manager Response: I apologize that we could not extend your stay. Thank you for your review!

Summary: The room was beautiful and very large. We got the standard king. The atmosphere is very nice too. We believed that our room was very clean right up until the morning of checkout. I had lifted the sheet that I slept on top of (bottom flat sheet) to check on any left behinds and found a bunch of food crumbs under it. We didn't eat in our room as we dined outside the hotel so it wasn't us. Other than that and the fact that EVERYTHING closes at 10pm in Anaheim, it is a beautiful hotel and the staff was very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We will use it to fine tune our operation.

Summary: We stayed here recently to celebrate my late father's birthday. We let the staff know why we were there and they were so incredibly accomodating and kind. We were surprised with beautiful amenities to help us celebrate Ryan from the front desk was incredibly helpful and sweet as he helped us unload our things. He honored our father with kind words and was very attentive to our needs. We had 1 hiccup with housekeeping not bringing us pillows one night, but the next morning they were so apologetic and brought us pillows very quickly. The rooftop pool is so beautiful and soothing. I highly recommend staying here for any occasion.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review

Summary: They do not offer a complete housekeeping service !! I can’t believe that a 5 star hotel don’t offer that service ! Until the 3 night !  They did it change my towels for clean ones and they didn’t take out the trash!  As they promise they will do ! Bad service
Manager Response: I apologize for the service your received,

Summary Heading: I would stay here again but would have to bring my own pillows from home.
Summary: Everything about this hotel was great EXCEPT FOR THE PILLOWS. The PILLOWS WERE HORRIBLE. It’s a shame that such a nice hotel would choose to cheap out on such an important thing. Now for the good things. The mattress was great. Everything else about the room was good. Very clean. The restaurant has a small menu but everything that we had was fabulous. The staff is very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I apologize about the pillows.  I will bring it up to our Housekeeping director. I am glad the rest of your stay was great. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Great hot tub/pool/cabanas. The bourbon prices at both bars were egregious, but hey!—fun to stare at all the Weller. :) The ART transit bus is a little difficult to master, you need two apps. If you want to leave the park before 5:30pm, just get an Uber/Lyft.
Manager Response: Thank you for thinking of us as "Fancy" we love it! The Anaheim Transit is a little tricky but our Front Desk team will walk you through it.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for New Years eve
Summary: We spent New Year's eve and enjoyed not only Disneyland's fireworks but the whole city from the comfort of our room. It has a modern but comfortable vibe and the whole staff was really friendly. Our bell hop Ryan even helped us get ice when we check in.  We also enjoyed the breakfast buffet and it is definitely one of the best I have tried. Our son also enjoyed the pool that was heated. We will definitely be back and might make this an annual event!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are glad you choose us to spend New Years Eve with and are excited to hear that you want to make this an annual event. Ryan will be delighted that you acknowledged him as I am sure it was a pleasure to provide this service to you.

Summary: I had the worst experience in my life , the manager there just want to collect money as much as he can regardless of the customer experience , miss leading information to let you pay a lot of money , I paid 530 $ while my reservation was in 250 only , but I have to pay to have a seat ,   in a very bad quality food with no drinks and sharing table with other stranger couples I forced to seat with them in the table , and this was not shown from the beginning , when I asked him why it’s not shown on ur page he laughed because ppl doesn’t read and they pay a-lot of money then they come  , u can say  they used me because it’s already the NYE and I already booked and it’s non refundable so you have to pay otherwise u will lose ur money and lose the NYE .
Manager Response: On behalf of the staff at Radisson Blu I apologize for the experience you had on New Years Eve. I would love the opportunity to speak to you regarding your stay and see what we can do to make it right. Please contact me directly at the hotel, I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary Heading: Newish Full Service Hotel Near Disneyland
Summary: Overall great newish full-service hotel close to the Disney Parks.  High points include a rooftop bar and adult pool with views of the parks, an in-lobby coffee bar, restaurant and gift shop, and nice touches on the lobby artwork tied to Disney. The only two negatives were, we stayed on the 10th floor and the common area hallway from the elevators to our room looked like it had not been vacuumed in some time.  There were bits of trash and rubbish on it throughout the three days we were there and there were at least two to three cleaning people on the floor during the day.  I am not sure why they did not simply run a vacuum on it and while it was a minor nuisance, it was annoying especially during a pandemic and it was also during Christmas Eve and Christmas Day, so there could
Manager Response: I am glad you had a great stay overall. I have discussed your concerns with our housekeeping director to ensure that the cleanliness of the elevators and attention to detail is  kept to our high standards, I apologize for the  inconvenience.

Summary: ART pickup from the lobby. Nice clean rooms. Quick service for breakfast available in the lobby. No sit down restaurant for breakfast, but most people are heading out in the mornings anyway. Hotel was decorated for the holidays.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and feedback, we appreciate it!

Summary: Great customer service. Beautiful  and very clean. Would definitely stay at this hotel again.  My only complaint would be is that the restaurants were too expensive. Very small breakfast menu. Restaurants not open every day
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, we appreciate it!

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and we felt safe. But this is not worth the money we paid in my opinion. $30 daily tax rate PLUS $25 DAILY parking rate doesn’t make this a very affordable option anymore. It’s super close to restaurants and disneyland, but I would say it’s JUST outside walking distance due to other construction in the area and a night time homeless population sleeping on sidewalks making it so you must walk in the street to get around them. No free drink tickets, no free breakfast options, two water bottles in mini fridge that carry a $$$ charge. Hot water went out for a day. overall just not worth the kind of money we spent
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments and feedback, I will forward your comments to our management staff for review, should you need further assistance please do not hesitate to reach out directly.

Summary: Several things that happened while staying. The parking fee is ridiculous pricing. Few vehicles. Gates were open and parking lot wasn’t monitored. $12 breakfast sandwich, the grab n go was too expensive. Numerous 911 emergency personal onsite and I had to call 911 because of a domestic fight next door at 2am.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay with us. While I understand your concern with emergency personnel, I can assure you there were no issues. The local department hosted a meeting at our facility.  We do appreciate the feedback and hope to do better on your next stay.

Summary: Went to Disney for a family vacation and the Radisson Blu was definately the correct choice. Incredible ambience, clean, and phenomenal service. Everything and more you could want from a hotel. I cannot say enough about how well the staff treated us, and how comfortable we felt staying here. I have a phobia of elevators due to a bad personal experience and the staff was quick, professional, and understanding to accommodate. This built my trust in the staff and company overall and I built up the confidence to take the elevator on the last day of my family's stay. I was so excited about taking the elevator I had to call the front desk and give my Thanks to the staff. Incredible, and already planning on returning next year. We WILL be staying at the Radisson Blu!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!

Summary: Great place to stay for a weekend getaway or just to stop by for drinks at the ground level bar. Steve made some amazing drinks which my girlfriend loved and he noticed it was my birthday because of the pin I was wearing. Great stay only negative I would say is a 25 dollar parking fee per night that more then likely you will have to pay unless you walk there or Uber there for your stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review!

Summary Heading: Poor management of simple service requests. Not accepting a return of an $8 bottle of wine that we paid $30 for. So not
Summary: Poor management of simple service requests. Not accepting a return of an $8 bottle of wine that we paid $30 for. So not worth transporting on the plane. Good service would be a credit back towards the $15 per day parking fee!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. Please accept our sincerest apologies if your visit was anything less than satisfying due to the concern you had at that time. We make it a point to ensure that all our guests have a truly rewarding stay and we are incredibly sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Your feedback is highly important to us and will be used for further improvements to our services. We hope for another opportunity to make a more favorable impression in the future.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. We stayed for 5 days and the room was great. It was roomy, clean and the staff was amazing.  Helped us upgrade to a fireworks facing room, helped us with any requests we had and even helped us find a car service to take us to the airport. 10/10 would stay here again even though the beds were too firm for liking the service made up for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!

Summary: This was our third and likely final stay with the Radisson Blu Anaheim. There have been no groundbreaking issues but after three 2-night stays and with other luxury/boutique properties opening around the Disney resort there’s just been one too many small issues. The customer service just feels sub-par and for me that’s a huge reflection of the stay as a whole :/ I just want someone to pleasantly greet me at check-in. I’m convinced the nicest people in the hotel were the two women working the rooftop restaurant who helped us with our takeout one night. And it doesn’t require a hotel reservation to experience that.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We are delighted to hear that you were pleased with the restaurant staff. On the other hand, we are saddened to know that your experience was anything less than satisfying due to the concern you had with the service of other staff at that time. As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience, we are sorry that we failed to meet your expectations. We hope that you will reconsider and give us another chance to provide you an experience that is truly excellent in all aspects.

Summary Heading: Was Disappointed.  Likely Will Not Be My First Pick for Another Trip to Disneyland
Summary: This is a beautiful hotel with excellent customer service, but I wouldn't stay here again unless the price was truly worth it.  During our stay, their amenities were not as listed.  The external grounds were covered with garbage (literally there were cupcake containers and food wrappers with food still in them on the grounds outside of the hotel our entire 5 day stay).  The cafe was not open for most of our stay leaving us with the only breakfast option being off-site or buying a muffin in the small coffee shop on site (which was excellent coffee and priced reasonably).  The pool bar was not open and we looked forward to returning to the hotel mid-day for a drink and relaxation.  We were disappointed that this was only open on certain days.  There are two pools with one for
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments and feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I apologize for the issues you experienced and have forwarded your remarks to our management for review. Please reach out to the hotel directly and ask to speak to anyone in management as we would be happy to assist you with this further.

Summary: Our stay here was great! This hotel had very clean and spacious rooms. The BluSky bar drinks were great and the views were awesome. Loved the ambiance up there. And it was a short 5 minute drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: This place was beautiful and quiet - we stayed 5 nights and slept so good! Everything was perfect - staff service, food, drinks, shuttle service etc. I especially loved the Star Wars themed decor. Will definitely be staying again
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: The fun aesthetic of this place brings you in, but the hospitality keeps you there! I am so grateful to Danielle and her team. They made my guests and me feel taken care of during a whirlwind weekend. Our suite was on the floor we requested and had everything we needed. The front desk had the things we forgot we needed. I was able to get ready for my wedding (hair and makeup and dress!) comfortably thanks to the suite life and even had space for my sister and friends to also get ready with me. We were able to enjoy rooftop cocktails after the Dodgers won slash to celebrate the night before the exciting day. Having the hotel ten minutes from the venue and all of my out of town guests close was one less thing I had to worry about. So grateful to the Radissom Blu for a wonderful
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review and feedback, we appreciate it!

Summary: I stayed here as my Godson was a participant in a basketball camp held across the street. The staff I interacted with were very nice and quick to respond to any problem or situation.that I experienced. I will save up some money and try to come back and stay here for the camp next year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review and feedback, we appreciate it!

Summary: The Radisson Blu exceeded our expectations. The staff was extremely friendly and met all her needs. The rooms were spacious, Clean and beautifully decorated. The roof top restaurant was amazing we watched the Disney fireworks and had appetizers and drinks outside. I would highly recommend staying here to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback and review, we appreciate it!

Summary: Love staying at the Radisson! Staff was great and such a clean place with really nice people. I thought it was so fancy. My kids enjoyed being in the room more than going out to tour the city. Hope I go again some day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you and your kids had a great stay. We would love to have you return!

Summary: Room and hotel was very clean, no carpet in the room was a plus. Staff was very friendly and attentive to needs.Great family friendly hotel. Hotel is a short Uber/Lyft ride to Disneyland. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: This is one of the best hotels that I've ever stayed in. Every single staff member that I encountered during my stay were extra helpful and super friendly. From the front desk staff, to the gift shop staff, to the housekeeping staff, to the bartenders and waitresses, everybody was amazing so accomodating!! I didn't want to leave! I was very happy with my stay. Plus the hotel itself was so beautiful and clean!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary Heading: Staff is not accommodating to families with young children
Summary: Tried to check in early by a couple of hours with a screaming baby and the front desk did not care. Got a lecture on check in and check out policies instead. The guy said they had a room ready. We just needed to pay an additional $75 to get in early. Or upgrade $35 per day for our three night stay and they’d waive the early check in. Alllllll this whole my baby is screaming tired and we just needed to get him out of the car and settled in. No compassion at all.   The pool area is not relaxing. It’s against the freeway and super loud. If you’re coming for the pool. Skip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback regarding your stay with us. I apologize as we did not meet your expectations. I have forwarded your comments to management to review, we  hope you will give us another opportunity to make things right. Please feel free to reach out at anytime for further assistance.

Summary: Lovely new hotel! Very clean and super friendly staff. Very close to Disneyland, and available at a reasonable price. Stayed with my family of 5 and would definitely return and would suggest to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: Beautiful new hotel. This hotel is new and clean and beautiful. The adults only pool is so nice. The beds are comfortable. The linens are quality. Quiet away from Disneyland but inexpensive Uber ride to front gate. I will stay stay here again.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff, rooms and prices are perfect at this hotel. Very satisfied with our stay. We have another stay already booked with more of our family. Good location - not far from Disneyland, restaurants and stores.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review. See you again soon!

Summary Heading: Better off elsewhere for the price
Summary: There is no access to a microwave anywhere on the property so we had to eat out every time we wanted food. None of the left over food from restaurants could be eaten again and had to be thrown out which is terrible and added to our overall trip expenses. No window or patio access so the room will be muggy especially after swimming. No complementary breakfast for the price they charge and they charge for daily parking. I recommend looking elsewhere for this price!
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and will use it to fine tune our operations in the hope that upon your next visit we can exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: great option for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: Very comfortable with all amenities needed for families with small children. Attention to detail is quite good. We will be staying here in the future. Also having a bunk bed option is a big hit with our kids!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us! I am glad your kid's enjoyed the bunk beds, we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: This hotel is clean, has comfortable beds, and wonderful staff. Every person we interacted with- front desk, bellhop, giftshop attendant, restaurant staff, and poolside bartender - were friendly, professional, and efficient. Never had to wait long for anything.   Also, the food in the downstairs restaurant is the best.   I’d definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Radisson Blu Anaheim - ANAC. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear you had a great experience with us, especially regarding the friendliness of our staff. I am very glad you enjoyed the food in Firelake. Come visit us again soon!

Summary: Best time ever! I like to leave reviews Bc I def peruse yelp and TripAdvisor when booking.   This place was completely equipped w all our needs including TWO cribs for my twin grandbabies.! Excellent in every way.    Super clean!!! What I assume is newish building.  Friendly helpful staff! We weren’t sure about breakfast Bc of covid rules. But staff accommodated our every need. We felt safe in parking structure and inside.   The shuttle to disney was simple and convenient. The outdoor bar was on point poolside! We only viewed the sky lounge and rooftop pool and let me tell you, the views and accommodations up there are ON point as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, next time we hope you get a chance to try out the Skybar and rooftop pool.  I agree,  the views are amazing!  We hope to see you and your grandbabies again soon.

Summary: Stayed at this beautiful hotel for three nights. Had three rooms booked and everyone in the party was very pleased with the stay. Special thank you to Laura & Brandi at the front desk for their stellar customer service! Having a great front desk team makes the whole experience even better! Keep up the great work Radisson Blu Anaheim!
Manager Response: What a great review.  I will share your experience with Laura, Brandi and the Front Desk team.  Hope to see you again soon! Thank you for choosing us!

Summary: Our families stayed here to celebrate our son’s wedding. The Blu Sky Bar on the rooftop was exclusive for the rehearsal dinner the night before. The food and the menu prepared by the executive chef was amazing. The managers and the staff were fantastic and did a fabulous job!!!!  The staff not only did a great job the day of, but  all along the way. From the moment our families arrived our rooms were ready, super clean, and the pool cabanas were reserved for our meeting location. Our families definitely want to go back again. If you are looking for a 5 star venue with great accommodations, amazing food and fantastic staff this is the place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review. It was our pleasure to host you for your son's wedding. We look forward to seeing you again,

Summary: Amazing Place to stay. Extremely nice workers. It’s also extremely clean and it’s nice and new. Plus it’s close to Disneyland and there’s a few fast food places down the street. There’s a really good cafe by the lobby of the hotel. Has a nice pool. Definitely plan on staying here again
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Enjoyed staying in this hotel for 4 nights. Location is fantastic for us as it was not even 10 minutes away from Disneyland. Staff were all nice. I wish we were able to eat at the Blu Sky rooftop restaurant, however, we never had a chance to do so as we were always coming home late and the restaurant wasn’t open on Sundays.   The room we stayed at was clean, however, we were having issues with the body wash and shampoo dispensers in the bathroom. The sliding doors in the shower also didn’t work well as it slid to the middle and wouldn’t completely close.   I would still definitely come back and stay at this hotel next time I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. I have forwarded your concerns to the appropriate management, We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: NIce hotel, not so nice employees (and fees)
Summary: Stayed for one night in this new resort-style hotel. However, the service left me with a bad first impression. It started at check-in where I was told that I couldn't get to my room early without paying an extra fee. Starting to get frustrated, I asked for a better room rather than having bunk beds in my way. The representative tried her best to make me keep my room as is. After going back and forth with her about the sizing of the room, I just decided to keep the room to appease her (she told me the bunk bed room was bigger and it was not). She then led me back to paying the early check-in. Frustrated and upset with this whole nickel and diming travelers and lying about room sizes, I agreed to just check-in and pay the fee. The least she could do was offer to keep my luggage so
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to address the issues you experienced during your recent stay with us. I apologize for the room you received being unsatisfactory. As a courtesy we do offer Bell Service and would have been happy to store your luggage.  Rest assured that I have taken your comments and addressed them with our management team.  We do hope you will give us another opportunity to make things right.

Summary Heading: Great new hotel, in a fantastic location
Summary: Used a Radisson free night certificate to stay for one night in September.  The hotel is conveniently located right off the freeway, and is very close to Disneyland (1.2 miles - we were able to walk!) and Angels Stadium (1.5 miles).  We were upgraded to a suite due to our Gold status and the fact we were celebrating an anniversary...it was small for a suite but very comfortable, clean and stylish.    The rooftop bar area is absolutely beautiful - lots of couch/lounge seating with fireplaces for warmth and ambiance.  We went up in the evening to watch the Disneyland fireworks.  Tip: during dinner hours all of the patio seating is reserved, so make a reservation at the restaurant if you want to guarantee a seat!  We only wanted to have a drink so we were lucky enough to grab a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the incredible review. I will be sure to share your comments with our team. We appreciate it so much and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel...but disability rooms aren't actually disability friendly.
Summary: Radisson Blu Anaheim is a beautiful hotel.  You walk into a stunning lobby that takes you a moment to take in. The staff was friendly and check in was easy, they even signed us up for rewards right there at the front desk.  There was a gift shop in the lobby but I did not check it out. Very modern and clean hotel.  You park in a fully gated garage so there's extra security there.  They do charge you a daily parking fee that they actually tax so after taxes it's almost $29 to park a day.  They have 4 elevators that you don't have to wait very long for.  You cannot go up the elevator without your key card, the key card allows it to move.  So there is that little security step too.   We had booked a king disability room.  We always book disability rooms where ever we stay since I
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the incredible review. I will be sure to share your comments with our team. We appreciate it so much and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel opened just a couple of months prior to our visit - a modern sleek hotel; we had a huge room overlooking Disneyland in the distance, with two queen-size beds and a bunk bed (so technically can accommodate a family of 6), lots of modern amenities, very attentive staff. Public transport shuttle system to the park needs to work out some kinks (at times, it can take significantly longer to get from the park and back than you plan for), but that’s the only nitpick. On the top floor is Skybar - a great lounge and tapas restaurant, where everything we ordered was very good. Breakfast at the Fire Lake on the ground floor is very nice, albeit for hotel-level prices. Another breakfast alternative is the Marketplace Cafe, where sandwiches and coffee are available. Would return in
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the incredible review. I will be sure to share your comments with our team. We appreciate it so much and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here with husband and 4 year old the night prior to checking in to Disney Grand California. Preferred this hotel over the Grand California - cleaner and much more affordable at 1/4 the cost. Everything is new and clean. Safe parking structure for car. Got the Magical Opening Package which included free parking , $25 Disneyland gift card and $50 dining credit. The rooftop restaurant was great! However not too many choices for a 4 year old who was not a fan of the “fancy” food. Cafe with pastries and bagels (similar to Starbucks) for dinner. Other restaurant was not open yet. Planning to stay here again for another Disneyland trip in December and looking forward to it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the fantastic review, we appreciate it so much. You'll be happy to know we do have our ground floor restaurant opened now and just in time for your next visit. The items on the menu are certainly kid friendly with plenty of options to chose from. We look forward to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay and Excellent Platinum Member Benefits
Summary: I am a Radisson Platinum member and I am glad that more Blu's are being built in the US. This hotel is new and and I loved that there are 2 pools. One is ground floor family pool (with large hot tub) and there is a rooftop adults pool. There is also a restaurant on site but it was closed. Also, a Skybar, unfortunately we were not able to see it at night. Multiple lounge areas in the rooftop with panoramic views.  Since I came with kids I chose the high floor bunkbed room. Also, it is walking distance to Disney. The décor is modern, an artsy carpet that my daughter loved.  I was able to get late checkout, welcome amenity and complimentary breakfast for my group (at the market). Parking is $25/night. We had a nice Disney view, the other side is in front of highway and it can be
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the amazing review and feedback and thank you for being a valued Radisson Rewards member. We are thrilled to hear how well your visit with us went and look forward to seeing you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Worst service for the money you pay
Summary: Reserved a room with King Bed for two nights online. Reached the hotel and they said the room not available and had to finally settle in for a room with 2 queens and a bunk bed. Had to shell out a few hundred dollars for this change. The room was pretty clean and was good. The worst part is the housekeeping or service. I get that during these times they are short-staffed. If you are going to give the customers sub-par experience then reduce the hotel rates as well. I was never able to connect to housekeeping for 2 continuous days and the front desk had a long line on a weekend morning with just one person manning it and she was on a call as well. Not the kind of experience I would like to have for the money I spend on the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and feedback, it certainly looks like we did not meet your expectations and I'm sure the issues you encountered must have been extremely frustrating. I sincerely apologize for that and can assure you we are addressing this and working hard to make corrections. If we can be of further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to anyone in management directly. We hope you will give us another opportunity in the near future.

Summary: 12 of us stayed for the holiday weekend, several enjoyed a wonderful dinner at the rooftop restaurant while the rest had a great time at the splash pad and pool. The facilities were awesome and very secure. We had to learn how to use the elevator with the room key but adjusted well. The staff especially Carla in the gift shop were so kind. Definitely coming back as soon as i can.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the amazing review, we are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us. I will be sure to let Carla know of the feedback. We hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: We had such a great time, the staff was wonderful and so pleasant. The hotel was so clean Thank you Radisson Blu for such a memorable weekend with my family. We had 4 generations on this trip - something for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we truly appreciate it and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We're locals and had tickets/reservations to the Disneyland and DCA in June. Our waiter at the Blu Sky hotel restaurant (back in April) provided us with a discount code for upcoming stay. Booked their best room (suite with resort view) for a steal. We took a Lyft from home to avoid having to pay for parking at the hotel (turns out the ride was slightly less than parking). Check in was friendly and efficient - perhaps because it was at 7:30 PM on a Tuesday? Room was well appointed with Disney themed wall art and plenty of charging options at the bedside. Wife loved the large vanity area with mirror. Huge shower had a separate bathtub and shower (agree with other reviewers that the soap/shampoo/conditioner bottles were not installed correctly). Used the lobby level pool and hot
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive review, we really appreciate it and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Because It Is New But Not Impressed By Service or Much Else
Summary: Overall a decent hotel at a fair price but with minimal guest services.  Would I stay again?  Likely not given there are so many other comparable hotels in the area that are more centralized and offer better amenities.  The hotel is new and completed but surrounded by in progress construction of apartment buildings and sidewalks.  It is located right off of I-5 and easily accessible.  Not much is within walking distance other than a large indoor swap meet, which is open daily until 7pm, where you will find authentic Mexican food, vendors selling toothbrushes to cars and personal services such as tattoos, piercings, and massages.  There is a selection of new shops and places to eat over the freeway about 4-5 blocks the other way.  It is a do-able distance on foot but probably not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to address your concerns regarding your stay with us, it looks as though we fell short of meeting your expectations and I am truly sorry for that. It is certainly not our best practice to have our guests leave unhappy. I have taken your comments back to management to review and address so that we can correct the issues right away to prevent them from repeating. In the meantime, if you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out directly. We do hope you will give us another opportunity in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is less than 5 min from Disneyland! It was so much more affordable than other hotels and it’s brand new! My family loved the bunk bed rooms and pool. Our Room were clean, spacious and the gift shop had tons of snacks! Parking was easy, too! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Sydney for the great review and feedback, we truly appreciate it an hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Cons 1. Rooftop pool is not open to kids 2. They do not help you with your bag 3. The front desk is super unhelpful 4. It takes forever to check in 5. ZERO FOOD! No room service, no restaurant, no takeout. We couldn’t even get a microwave to reheat food that we had to buy externally for my young children.  6. They said they would try to get in with an early check in and would call when our room was ready. Guess what not only did they not call but our room wasn’t even ready at regular checkin.  7. Mostly the front desk staff is super rude.  8. Forget getting a cocktail after a long day at Disneyland or even bottled water.   Pro 1. Gift shop worker was very nice 2. Nice view but we stayed in the second most expensive room option.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review and comment about your recent stay with us. It seems as though there was some communication issues that would have rectified these so I do apologize for that.  While we do have 2 outlets closed at this time, we do have 2 other outlets that are open 7 days a week serving food and beverage items, we have 2 restaurants, one coffee shop and 3 bars in total. The decor is modern and spotless. The 2 pools were clean and heated. There was plenty of parking in the garage also. Everything was perfectly convenient. Although we ate at the highly rated Skybar, there are plenty of local 5 star restaurants around town to enjoy.  The rooms are high tech with state of the art thermostat control and a TV that allows you to control with your phone and watch any programming you might fancy that you have access to from your phone (Amazon prime, Netflix, YouTube, HBO max, att, etc).  The lights are all LED. The flooring is wood and easy to clean and doesn’t trap
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the amazing review and feedback Paul, we truly appreciate it and are thrilled to hear how well your stay went. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for a night as a staycation on our first trip back to Disneyland.  The property is brand new and not all restaurants are open yet. The place is well designed but does feel a little cold and generic.  We stayed in one of the highest level rooms, the one bedroom king suite. Room 1000 on the corner. The view of Disneyland was great but on the other side the view was of a construction site and the Anaheim indoor swapmeet.  Overall the room was nice and spacious, the bed was comfy and it was nice to have a refrigerator in the room but would have been nice to have a microwave to reheat left overs. Summary: We stayed a few months back but have frequented Blu SkyBar often since it's reopening. This hotel is exactly what Anaheim was lacking. There is so much to do in this building, you can go downstairs and feel like you are in Cabo then head up to the 12th floor to Blu SkyBar and walk right into Vegas night life but with extra ambiance and incredible views of the Anaheim resort. This hotel was the perfect getaway!
